 Tally app is provided for anyone who work and or engaged in oil and gas activity, particularly in drilling operation.

This app is designed with a clear and sharp view to make it easy and friendly to use.
Also this app is compatible for smartphone and tablets and supporting portrait and landscape screens. Main features of the Tally App ;
 - Petroleum units conversion to convert the units are often used in drilling operation, such as weight, volume, temperature and other parameters.
 - API Tubular Data provides tubular data base such as casing, tubing, and drill pipe, and give a quick access to pipe dimension, weight, capacity and displacement.
 
- Drilling Formula - Drilling Calculation.
 - Easy to make a note day by day in this app.
 - Well control Kill Sheet in an IADC based calculation to stop the flow of an influx from fresh formation.
 - Realtime updating of parameter data while drilling operation continued by monitoring parameter data from app 
- Learn about the types, composition and main functions of drilling mud 
 - Familiar with tools and equipment for drilling rigs and their functions 
 - Identify and how to prevent H2S toxic gas disaster 
 - Learn to know and analyze rock layers, rock composition and oil or gas content in them. 

This Tally App is friendly and easy to use, and the best part of this is Tally App work in offline and online mode. Please make a rate n share this app if you found many benefits in there.
